title: Dragonmaster
description: Hal Kailas, runaway pauper, dreams of boyhood, when he bonded with a young dragon. His thoughts are consumed with memories of the beast's great strength and power. When war finally comes, only most daring and ruthless of men ride dragons - monstrous weapons of war, rulers of the sky. Few men are strong enough to bend a dragon's will, but Hal believes he may be one of them.
author: Chris Bunch
